resources.string: Please allow read permission to open model files.
Welcome to a3Dyou Creating 3D Avatar of yourself cannot get simpler than this!!
Are you sure you want to logout?
List of Good Input Image Criteria
2. Other people should be absent in the image.
3. Mirrors and other reflecting surfaces should be absent in the image.
4. Background behind a person should differ from him/her in color.
5. A person should have a correct posture up to the position of the arms and legs relative to the body.
6. Body should be oriented vertically on the image.
7. Body location on the image should satisfy the certain criteria.
